      • prepareForCluster

        public void prepareForCluster(String profilename)
        Description copied from interface: IDesignerState
        This method is called by the FlowEngine when the corresponding process will be serialized. Cleanup logic should be done here, respectively the internal status of transient components will be saved.
        Specified by:
        prepareForCluster in interface IDesignerState

      • prepareForResumeFromCluster

        public void prepareForResumeFromCluster()
        Description copied from interface: IDesignerState
        This method is called by the FlowEngine when the corresponding process once again is deserialized and the process is before a new execution. Transient Variables should be initialized here.
        Specified by:
        prepareForResumeFromCluster in interface IDesignerState

      • cleanState

        public void cleanState()
        Description copied from interface: IDesignerState
        This method is called by the FlowEngine when the corresponding process is successfully done. Cleanup logic should be done here.
        Specified by:
        cleanState in interface IDesignerState

      • rollbackExecute

        public void rollbackExecute()
        Description copied from interface: IDesignerState
        This method is called by the FlowEngine when the corresponding process is NOT successfully done. Cleanup logic and special error reporting should be done here
        Specified by:
